items_to_supply.item_name: 200 pair, 0.5mm diameter, PIJF armoured copper cable
key_technical_requirements: Conductor: 0.5mm Solid Annealed high conductive Copper, circular.
Insulation: Polythene grade with anti-oxidant/copper inhibitor (max 2.35 dielectric constant).
Filling: Homogenous Petroleum Jelly (anti-oxidant, water-resistant).
Core: 200 pairs, grouped as 4 units of 50 pairs.
Moisture Barrier: Polythene coated aluminum tape, min 3mm overlap, 0.3mm +15% thickness.
Armouring: Double helical Galvanized steel tape, 0.5mm ±10%.
Sheath: Polythene grade (BS 6234), anti-oxidant, minimum 1.62mm (nominal 2.2mm) thickness.
Jacket: Solid polythene (BS 6234), minimum 1.4mm thickness.

Electrical: Conductor resistance 86 ± 6 Ohms/km, Mutual capacitance 52 ± 3 nF/km, Insulation resistance min 5000 MΩ-KM (at 500V DC). Spark test (conductor-conductor 2.4KV DC, conductor-shield 5.0KV DC). Attenuation 8.25 dB/Km at 150KHz.
Packing: 1000m ± 10% on strong wooden drums, sealed ends, hot stamped with SDSC SHAR authority, sequential sheath marking.
critical_parameters: Sheath minimum thickness: 1.62 mm (not less than 75% of 2.2mm nominal)
Insulation resistance (conductor-to-conductor/shield): Min 5000 MΩ-KM at 500 V DC-1 Min
Spark test dielectric strength (conductor-to-conductor): 2.4 KV DC for 3 Sec
Spark test dielectric strength (conductor-to-shield): 5.0 KV DC for 3 Sec

items_to_supply.item_name: 5 pair, 0.5mm diameter, Armoured FRLS copper cable
key_technical_requirements: Conductor: 0.5mm Solid annealed Bare copper, electrolytic grade (IS:8130), circular.
Insulation: Extruded Polyethylene, color coded as per GR/WIR 06/03 Table-2.
Core: 5 twisted pairs, lay length max 80mm.
Armouring: Single layer Galvanized Steel Round wire (IS: 3975).
Inner Sheath: PVC type TM-2 (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831), minimum 0.65mm thickness.
Outer Sheath: Extruded FRLS PVC type TM-2 (IS:13176) or ST1 (IS:5831), minimum 1.24mm thickness.
Overall Cable Diameter: 11.5 ± 2mm.
Electrical: Conductor resistance 86 ± 6 ohms/km, min insulation resistance 50M.ohms/km, HV test 2KV RMS for 1 min, capacitance unbalance (pair-to-pair) ≤ 230pF.
Fire Safety: Flammability test (IEC-332 Part-1), Smoke density rating (ASTM D2843, max 60%).
Packing: 500m ± 10% on drum/reel, marking as per TEC GR.
critical_parameters: High voltage test parameter: 2KV RMS for 1 minute

mandatory_tests: Volume resistivity of petroleum jelly test
Variation between the maximum and minimum diameter over sheath at any cross section test
Elongation and tensile strength of conductor insulation test
Dielectric strength (High voltage) between conductors test
Dielectric strength (High voltage) between all conductors and shield test
Equal level far end cross talk test
testing_and_quality.inspection_process: Pre-Delivery inspection at factory site/online video mode as per standard Quality Assurance Plan, with clearance from SDSC SHAR's Pre-Delivery inspection team required before dispatch. Minimum 50% of the ordered quantity shall be tested with the presence of SDSC SHAR authorities.
testing_and_quality.lab_or_certification_requirements: All relevant standard test certificates/data sheets which comply with the technical specifications of each type of cable in this RFP are required.

eligibility_constraints.technical_experience: Bidder requires prior experience in supplying similar items to private/public organizations in the last seven years.
eligibility_constraints.manufacturing_requirements: OEM must be in manufacturing for a minimum of 5 years (as of bid closing date). Self-certification from OEM required. Affidavit from OEM stating no blacklisted 3rd party equipment supplied.
certifications_required: Standard test certificates/data sheets for each cable type.
OEM authorization certificate for the bidder.
Self-certification from OEM regarding manufacturing duration (5 years).
OEM affidavit concerning non-supply of blacklisted equipment.
Self-certification for Class-I/Class-II local supplier (with statutory auditor certificate if bid value > Rs. 10 Cr.).

eligibility_constraints: Self-certification from OEM regarding manufacturing duration (5 years).
OEM affidavit concerning non-supply of blacklisted equipment.
Self-certification for Class-I/Class-II local supplier (with statutory auditor certificate if bid value > Rs. 10 Cr.).

OEM affidavit concerning non-supply of blacklisted equipment.
Self-certification for Class-I/Class-II local supplier (with statutory auditor certificate if bid value > Rs. 10 Cr.).
Self-certification for Class-I/Class-II local supplier (with statutory auditor certificate if bid value > Rs. 10 Cr.).

delivery_and_warranty.delivery_timeline: Supply to be completed within 12 weeks from order date, F.O.R. SDSC SHAR, Sriharikota. Supplier responsible for transit risks and unloading.
delivery_and_warranty.warranty: Minimum one year from the date of acceptance of cables at client end.

technical_risks_or_flags.warranty: Minimum one year from the date of acceptance of cables at client end.
technical_risks_or_flags: High complexity due to six distinct cable variants (five PIJF, one FRLS) with specific, non-interchangeable physical dimensions and material requirements.
Extensive mandatory testing regime covering electrical, physical, material, and fire safety properties, demanding comprehensive in-house or accredited lab capabilities.
Strict adherence to multiple national and international standards (DOT TEC GR, BS, IS, IEC, ASTM) for materials, design, and testing, increasing compliance verification overhead.
Mandatory pre-delivery inspection and minimum 50% quantity testing in presence of client authorities requires robust QA processes and efficient scheduling.
Tight dimensional and electrical parameter tolerances across all cable types necessitate precise manufacturing and rigorous quality control at every stage.
